TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed AccessControlEntryType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定是否允許、拒絕、或撤銷信任項 (Trustee) 的存取權限。

span.span: Specifies whether to allow, deny, or revoke access rights for a trustee.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用類別來指定新的存取權限的信任者，您將設定其屬性以描述要授與權限或拒絕它。When you use the class to specify a new access right for a trustee, you set its property to describe whether to grant the right or deny it. 此外，您可以定義新的權限會附加至現有的清單 （如果您要為其加入或移除存取權限的內容中已存在之信任項目） 或新的權限會覆寫，並刪除任何先前定義的權限。Furthermore, you can define whether the new right is appended to an existing list (if the trustee already exists in the context for which you are adding or removing access privileges) or if the new right overwrites and deletes any previously defined rights. 當建立新`Allow`項目，可能會有預先存在`Deny`相同信任項目會優先，而且必須處理的項目。When creating a new `Allow` entry, there might be a preexisting `Deny` entry for the same trustee that takes precedence and must be addressed. 同樣地，當建立新`Deny`項目，可能有現有`Allow`優先順序的項目。Similarly, when creating a new `Deny` entry, there might be an existing `Allow` entry that takes precedence. 存取權限的套用順序的相關資訊，請參閱。For information about the order in which access rights are applied, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AccessControlEntryType Allow = int32(1)

summary.span: 允許存取的項目會將新的權限加入至任何現有的信任項權限。

span.span: An access-allowed entry that causes the new rights to be added to any existing rights the trustee has.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AccessControlEntryType Deny = int32(3)

summary.span: 拒絕存取的項目會將拒絕的指定權限加入信任項目前已拒絕的權限。

span.span: An access-denied entry that denies the specified rights in addition to any currently denied rights of the trustee.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AccessControlEntryType Revoke = int32(4)

summary.span: 移除指定信任項所有的現有允許或拒絕權限的項目。

span.span: An entry that removes all existing allowed or denied rights for the specified trustee.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.AccessControlEntryType Set = int32(2)

summary.span: 允許存取的項目類似於 ，不同點在於新的項目只允許指定的權限。

span.span: An access-allowed entry that is similar to , except that the new entry allows only the specified rights.

summary.span: 使用它可以宣告任何現有的權限，包括信任項所有現有允許存取的項目。

span.span: Using it discards any existing rights, including all existing access-denied entries for the trustee.
